comments.author: beiwinters@t-online.de
comments.creator: beiwinters@t-online.de
comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

Or give the user a possibility to change symbols without changing the chosen persona. It's urgent, I suffer great pain, when I have to look at all that grey with my lovely spring persona.lol

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.Open firefox 4 
2.there they are
3.and they stay as long as I use firefox

Actual Results:  
I feel pain!

Expected Results:  
Symbols with colours of my choice, matching the persona of my choice.

For me that is a real problem, I work with firefox all day, and the grey is ...

comments.author: fmdevelopertim@gmail.com
comments.text: What theme are you using? What persona? Please attach a screenshot of the issue.
comments.creator: fmdevelopertim@gmail.com
comments.raw_text: What theme are you using? What persona? Please attach a screenshot of the issue.

comments.author: beiwinters@t-online.de
comments.creator: beiwinters@t-online.de
comments.raw_text:
The persona is "Longing for spring" and I tried other themes. Now it is the
firefox 4 original because other themes didn't work with any persona.
The theme I prefer is firefox 3 theme for firefox 4+, but that may change.
Why isn't it possible to change themes and personas independently.
comments.text:
Created attachment 524811
Screenshot with persona

The persona is "Longing for spring" and I tried other themes. Now it is the
firefox 4 original because other themes didn't work with any persona.
The theme I prefer is firefox 3 theme for firefox 4+, but that may change.
Why isn't it possible to change themes and personas independently.

comments.author: fmdevelopertim@gmail.com
